p: Small RNA-seq analysis revealed 67 miRNAs differentially expressed in ZIKV-infected TEC, resulting in 42 upregulated and 25 downregulated microRNAs (Table 1 and Supplemental Table 1). The hsa-miR-7-3-3p was the most upregulated miRNA (log2 FC = 5.16) after ZIKV infection. The majority of miRNAs presented a slightly upregulation or downregulation with log2 FC > |1| including hsa-miR-155-5p (1.55) and hsa-miR-203a-3p (1.19).
